sources.title: The Emperor's Nightingale
sources.description: Boris Karloff narrates a Czech version of the Hans Christian Andersen tale, about a boy king's dream of puppets and toys.

metadata.Plot: A Chinese emperor prefers the tinkling of a bejeweled mechanical bird to the song of a real nightingale. When the Emperor is near death, a nightingale's song restores his health and teaches him to revolt against his glittering but shallow world.
metadata.Writer: Vítezslav Nezval, Hans Christian Andersen, Jirí Brdecka
metadata.Actors: Helena Patockova, Jaromir Sobotoa, Detsky pevecky sbor Jana Kuhna
